clinical_study.brief_title: Objective Measurement Methods for Autoimmune Disease and Dry Eye Syndrome
clinical_study.official_title: Using the Objective Measurement Methods and TCM Questionnaire to Explore the Association Among TCM Pattern, TCM Tongue Diagnosis and TCM Pulse Diagnosis for Autoimmune Disease and Dry Eye Syndrome

brief_summary.textblock: To explore the association among TCM pattern, TCM tongue diagnosis and TCM pulse diagnosis for Autoimmune disease and Dry eye syndrome

detailed_description.textblock:
Objective: To explore the association among TCM pattern, TCM tongue diagnosis and TCM pulse diagnosis for Autoimmune disease and Dry eye syndrome
Method:
This study wants to establish the objective measurement of Autoimmune disease (AID) as Sjögren's syndrome (SJS), Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA), Systemic Sclerosis (SSc), Ankylosing spondylitis (AS) for comparing with the Dry eye syndrome (DES) subjects. And the investigators want to use the objective measurement tools to explore the association of TCM pattern, heart rate variability (HRV), TCM tongue diagnosis and TCM pulse diagnosis among at least 50 each AID group subjects and at least 50 DES subjects.
Expected Results:
1. To evaluate the difference among TCM pattern, HRV, TCM tongue diagnosis, TCM pulse diagnosis for the each AID groups.
2. To evaluate the difference among TCM pattern, HRV, TCM tongue diagnosis, TCM pulse diagnosis for the each DES groups.
3. To evaluate the difference among TCM pattern, HRV, TCM tongue diagnosis, TCM pulse diagnosis among the AID groups and DES group.
Keyword: Autoimmune disease, Dry eye syndrome, TCM pattern, TCM tongue diagnosis, TCM pulse diagnosis

primary_outcome.description: TCM pattern is a tool for detecting the constitution among the Sjögren's syndrome (SJS), Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA), Systemic Sclerosis (SSc), Ankylosing spondylitis (AS), and Dry eye syndrome (DES).

TCM tongue diagnosis is a tool for detecting tongue expression among the Sjögren's syndrome (SJS), Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA), Systemic Sclerosis (SSc), Ankylosing spondylitis (AS), and Dry eye syndrome (DES).

TCM pulse diagnosis is a tool for detecting pulse of radial artery among the Sjögren's syndrome (SJS), Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA), Systemic Sclerosis (SSc), Ankylosing spondylitis (AS), and Dry eye syndrome (DES) .

HRV is a tool for detecting the ratio between High-frequency (HF) activity and low-frequency (LF) activity. among the Sjögren's syndrome (SJS), Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), Rheumatoid Arthritis (RA), Systemic Sclerosis (SSc), Ankylosing spondylitis (AS), and Dry eye syndrome (DES) .

arm_group.description: Sjögren's syndrome patients were screened in the rheumatology outpatient departments and Center for Traditional Medicine at Taipei Veterans General Hospital, and were enrolled with the inclusion criteria: (1) aged between 20 and 75 years; (2) fulfilled the 2002 American-European Consensus Criteria for SS (AECG)

Systemic lupus erythematosus patients were screened in the rheumatology outpatient departments and Center for Traditional Medicine at Taipei Veterans General Hospital, and were enrolled with the inclusion criteria: (1) aged between 20 and 75 years; (2) fulfilled the 1982 revised Systemic lupus erythematosus criteria

Rheumatoid Arthritis patients were screened in the rheumatology outpatient departments and Center for Traditional Medicine at Taipei Veterans General Hospital, and were enrolled with the inclusion criteria: (1) aged between 20 and 75 years; (2) fulfilled the 2010 ACR/EULAR Rheumatoid Arthritis classification criteria

Systemic Sclerosis patients were screened in the rheumatology outpatient departments and Center for Traditional Medicine at Taipei Veterans General Hospital, and were enrolled with the inclusion criteria: (1) aged between 20 and 75 years; (2) fulfilled the 1980 ACR eSystemic Sclerosis criteria

Ankylosing spondylitis patients were screened in the rheumatology outpatient departments and Center for Traditional Medicine at Taipei Veterans General Hospital, and were enrolled with the inclusion criteria: (1) aged between 20 and 75 years; (2) fulfilled the 1984 Ankylosing spondylitis Modified New York criteria

Dry eye syndrome patients were screened in the ophthalmology outpatient departments, rheumatology outpatient departments and Center for Traditional Medicine at Taipei Veterans General Hospital, and were enrolled with the inclusion criteria: (1) aged between 20 and 75 years; (2) Schirmer's test less than 10 mm/5 min
